SEARCH
Package com.randomnoun.common.db

Class DatabaseReader

java.lang.Object
com.randomnoun.common.db.DatabaseReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
MysqlDatabaseReader
public abstract class DatabaseReader extends Object
Container class for database metadata.

Rewrite of DatabaseTO to be marginally more structured

Contains methods for populating metadata from the data dictionaries of Oracle and MySQL, for the purposes of whatever it is that I'm doing at the time. NB: does not set default values for oracle
